actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: A bill to provide scholarships for the dependent children of public safety officers who are the victims of homicide while performing their official duties, and for other purposes.
short_title: Public Safety Officers Memorial Scholarship Act

summary.text: Public Safety Officers Memorial Scholarship Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to award undergraduate scholarships to dependent children of public safety officers, including law enforcement officers and fire fighters, killed in the course of their official duties. Establishes guidelines for such scholarship awards. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Public Safety Officers Memorial Scholarship Act
A bill to provide scholarships for the dependent children of public safety officers who are the victims of homicide while performing their official duties, and for other purposes.
